heading: A Therapeutic Approach to Healing and Growth
paragraphs: My strategy is centered on creating a supportive and safe environment where you feel heard, understood, and valued. Healing is not a one-size-fits-all process, which is why I adapt my therapeutic approach to fit your unique needs and experiences.
I use proven methods like CBT, mindfulness, and supportive talk therapy to help you recognize patterns, strengthen resilience, and find healthier ways to cope with lifeâ€™s challenges.
This approach helps you manage challenges and build lasting growth, balance, and confidence.
